title: GAMA Italy Professional Hair Dryer Rose Gold - IQ Perfetto - Lightweight, Powerful Pro Salon Blow Dryer with Diffuser & 2 Concentrator Nozzle Attachment Tools (Under 1LB)
descriptions:
**GAMA Italy Professional Hair Dryer Rose Gold - IQ Perfetto**

Introducing the GAMA Italy Professional Hair Dryer Rose Gold - IQ Perfetto, the ultimate hair styling tool for professionals and enthusiasts alike. With its advanced features and cutting-edge technology, this hair dryer will revolutionize your hairstyling routine.

**Product Details:**
- Weight: Under 1LB
- Drying Speed: 30% faster than other dryers
- Motor Power: 1700W
- Motor Speed: Seven times faster than traditional hair dryers
- Color Options: Silver, Black
- Ergonomic Design with Oxy Active Technology
- Attachments: Diffuser, Concentrator Nozzles (2)

**Features:**
- Microfilter: Ensures clean and healthy airflow
- Auto Clean: Hassle-free maintenance for optimal performance
- LED Memory Configuration: 18 settings with LED display and auto diagnosis functionality

Experience the power and efficiency of the GAMA Italy Professional Hair Dryer Rose Gold - IQ Perfetto. Its powerful motor and innovative air flow design multiply the airflow, reducing drying time by 30%. The 1700W brushless motor delivers professional-grade performance, while the ergonomic design with Oxy Active Technology ensures maximum comfort during use.

Choose from two stunning color options, Silver and Black, to match your style. The included diffuser and 2 concentrator nozzles allow for versatile styling options, whether you want to enhance your natural curls or create sleek, straight looks.

The GAMA Italy Professional Hair Dryer Rose Gold - IQ Perfetto also features additional advanced features. The innovative microfilter prevents tiny dirt particles from entering the dryer, ensuring clean and healthy airflow. With the auto clean function, maintenance is a breeze, keeping your hair dryer in pristine condition.

The LED memory configuration offers 18 different settings, displayed on an easy-to-read LED screen. The auto diagnosis feature ensures optimal performance and longevity. With the GAMA Italy Professional Hair Dryer Rose Gold - IQ Perfetto, you can achieve professional results with ease.

Upgrade your hair styling game with the GAMA Italy Professional Hair Dryer Rose Gold - IQ Perfetto. Experience faster drying, professional performance, and sleek design all in one powerful hair dryer. Get yours today and unlock endless styling possibilities.

Whether you're a stylist or simply want salon-quality hair at home, this hair dryer is the perfect choice. Upgrade your hair drying routine and enjoy faster drying times, enhanced styling options, and healthier-looking hair. Choose the GAMA Italy Professional Hair Dryer Rose Gold - IQ Perfetto for a superior drying experience.
